page.syntax: GUID as C = a5ws_Get_GUID_From_Group(C group_name [,* Localrequest ])

argument.name: GUID
argument.description: The unique ID assigned to the group.

argument.name: group_name
argument.description: The group_name value of a group in the group table.

argument.name: Localrequest
argument.description: Optional. The request variable. Required if run from a web page.

page.description: Returns a group GUID from a group name. 'Request' must be provided if run in web page.
page.discussion: The A5WS_Get_GUID_From_Group() returns the unique ID assigned to a security group in the group table. Limitations: Web applications only.

see.ref: Returns the unique ID assigned to a security group in the group table
